step1: Rec Room is the best place to build and play games together. Party up with friends from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore MILLIONS of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all. Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets.
step2: Beside the games played on a normal table, recreation rooms sometimes include custom game tables for table tennis (ping pong), table football (foosball), table shuffleboard, air hockey, or billiards (pool). Custom tables for casino games such as poker, blackjack, and craps are also common.
step3: Room Keys can be used by RR+ members to lock access to parts of your rooms. Players then pay you tokens or room currency to unlock those features. They often unlock certain role modifiers, items, or experiences in custom rooms and are activated when an item is grabbed or when a costume is equipped. Once a user buys a Room Key, they will always have access to it unless itâ€™s deleted.
step5: To make things a little more exciting, they offering official League Sponsorship for qualifying leagues. If you run a league with at least 64 regular participants that lasts for 12 weeks, you may be eligible for prizes for your league - up to 100000 tokens total to divide among your winners, and, if available, up to 8 golden skins for a winning team
step6: If you would like to put on a workshop event, whether it is just putting together a bookshelf, making plants, or making a disco ball, this is a great opportunity to introduce new users to Rec Room creation, and maybe even teach new skills to existing creators, and get rewarded in the process.
step7: Rec Room has a regular cadence of special events and contests! From build contests and challenges, to social events and tournaments, to video, photo and art contests, you will definitely find something that interests you!
